title: Polish UX: better empty-state actions, dashboard progress indicator, and footer link cleanup

requirements.text: Make the Log page empty-state primary action actually help the user add their first entry by navigating to the Dashboard and automatically opening the Add Entry dialog.
acceptanceCriteria: When there are zero entries, clicking the empty-state button on /log routes the user to / (Dashboard).
After navigation from the Log empty state, the Add Entry dialog opens automatically without additional clicks.
The auto-open behavior triggers only once and does not keep re-opening on subsequent renders/navigation.
No changes are made to immutable hook files (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts[x], frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).

requirements.text: Improve the Dashboard’s readability by adding a clear visual indicator of daily limit usage (e.g., a progress bar or meter) and ensuring the over-limit state is visually distinct and accessible.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard shows a visual percent-used indicator for today’s caffeine intake relative to the daily limit.
The indicator has a clear over-limit style (e.g., destructive color treatment) when todayTotal > dailyLimit.
User-facing text remains in English and existing metrics (today total, daily limit, remaining) remain correct.

requirements.text: Clean up footer social icons so they are not dead links: replace placeholder href="#" links with a non-clickable/disabled presentation or remove them, while keeping the footer layout visually balanced.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer no longer contains anchor tags that navigate to "#" when clicked.
Footer remains visually consistent with the existing warm theme and layout.
No console errors or accessibility regressions are introduced by the footer change.

constraints: Backend must remain single-actor (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo).

Do not edit files under frontend immutablePaths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, and anything in frontend/src/components/ui (compose instead).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not add new authentication providers (Internet Identity only).
Do not add real-time features (e.g., WebSockets).
Do not introduce new backend storage schemas or migrations unless strictly required for the UX improvements above.
Do not add new pages beyond Dashboard/Log/Insights/Settings.
